p: Data presented in Table 5 show the impact of different LGEO levels on plasma lipid profile. Total cholesterol, triglyceride, LDL and VLDL were significantly lowered (linear and quadratic, P < 0.05) in LGEO-treated quails compared to those in the control. The dietary supplementation of LGEO (300, 450, and 600 mg/kg) increased high density lipoprotein (linear, P < 0.05) compared with the control group.
